mapper.insert: insert into room (rno,userid, roomname, location, imgname1,imgname2,imgname3,imgname4,imgname5, presentation1,presentation2,presentation3) values(room_rno_seq.nextval, #{userid},#{roomname},#{location},#{imgname1},#{imgname2},#{imgname3},#{imgname4},#{imgname5}, #{presentation1}, #{presentation2}, #{presentation3})
